materials.raw_text:
Bismuth Oxide (Bi2O3) - 80 g 
 Lanthanum Oxide (La2O3) - 12.5 g 
 Lithium Carbonate (Li2CO3) - 10 g 
 Neodymium Oxide (Nd2O3) - 7.5 g

sourcing.instructions:
Bismuth Oxide: Obtain from chemical supply companies or online suppliers specializing in metal oxides. 
 Lanthanum Oxide: Available from rare earth material suppliers or specialty chemical retailers. 
 Lithium Carbonate: Can be sourced from battery material suppliers or online chemical vendors. 
 Neodymium Oxide: Purchase from suppliers of rare earth materials or specialty chemical distributors.

preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure and weigh each ingredient accurately using a digital scale. 
 2. In a clean, dry container, add Bismuth Oxide and Lanthanum Oxide. 
 3. Slowly add Lithium Carbonate while stirring continuously to ensure even mixing. 
 4. Finally, add Neodymium Oxide and mix thoroughly until a uniform powder is achieved.
